content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --REASND
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --STAT
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: NOT DONE
Core:
  Id: CORE-000225
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --REASND is provided and --STAT is not equal to "NOT
  DONE".
Outcome:
  Message: --STAT should be "NOT DONE" when --REASND is provided.
  Output Variables:
    - --STAT
    - --REASND
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0094
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The explanation for why requested information was
                  not available. Used in conjunction with --STAT when value is "NOT
                  DONE".
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Interventions
              - Cited Guidance: The explanation for why requested information was
                  not available. Used in conjunction with --STAT when value is "NOT
                  DONE".
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Events
              - Cited Guidance: The explanation for why requested information was
                  not available. Used in conjunction with --STAT when value is "NOT
                  DONE".
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - EX
      - AE
      - DS
      - DV
      - IE
